name: Arachnophobic Skeleton
description:
This game was made in under 25hrs and is a submission for the 4th Benbonk Game Jam where the Theme was ''Keep It Away'' and the limitation was Only Use 4 Colours.

You play as an Arachnophobic Skeleton who is deathly afraid of Spiders. (Pun Intended)

--How To Play--

At random times Quick Time Event buttons will appear. You must click these buttons to make the Arachnophobic Skeleton blow the Spider back up, if you miss the Spider will gain a speed boost and if it gets to the Skeleton, it's game over.

The game gets progressively harder the longer you go on so see how long you can keep that nasty Spider away from the poor Skeleton!

--Disclaimer--

This is my second ever Game Jam, so I apologize if you come over any bugs.
